sys_script_include.description: Returns an array of table names that contain "secondary" records. "Secondary" records are records which are part of a larger structure and always reference directly or indirectly to a primary record. E.g., the "sys_atf_test" is a primary record, the contained test steps in "sys_atf_test_step" are secondry records.
sys_script_include.name: GetSecondaryRecordTables
sys_script_include.script: function GetSecondaryRecordTables() { var aSecondaryRecordTables = [ 'sys_metadata_delete', 'sys_scope_privilege', 'sys_restricted_caller_access', 'sys_documentation', 'sys_user_role_contains', 'sys_atf_test_suite_test', 'sys_atf_step', 'atf_input_variable', 'sys_security_acl_role', 'sys_embedded_help_role', 'sys_ui_policy_action', 'sys_ui_action_role', 'ua_table_licensing_config', 'x_snc_reactor_props', 'scan_check_suite_check', 'sys_ws_query_parameter_map', 'sys_kmf_crypto_caller_policy', 'sp_instance', 'sp_row', 'sp_column', 'sp_container', 'm2m_sp_widget_dependency', 'm2m_sp_dependency_js_include', 'sys_complex_object', 'sys_hub_action_output', 'sys_flow_trigger_auto_script', 'sys_hub_action_type_snapshot', 'sys_hub_flow_block', 'sys_hub_flow_input', 'sys_hub_flow_output', 'sys_hub_flow_snapshot', 'sys_hub_flow_variable', 'sys_hub_sub_flow_instance_inputs', 'sys_flow_cat_variable', 'sys_flow_data_definition', 'sys_flow_data_var', 'sys_flow_step_definition', 'sys_flow_step_definition_input', 'sys_flow_step_definition_output', 'sn_decision_table_decision_condition', 'sys_aw_list', 'sys_aw_list_attribute', 'sys_aw_list_category', 'sys_aw_module', 'sys_aw_new_menu_item', 'sys_aw_renderer', 'sys_db_view_table', 'sys_uib_screen_test_values', 'sys_ui_section', 'x_snc_reactor_component_token', 'x_snc_devtools_transporter_record', 'sys_ws_header', 'ais_rule_action', 'ais_child_table', 'ais_acl_overrides', 'ais_datasource_attribute', 'ais_datasource_field_attribute', 'ais_search_source', 'cxs_table_config', 'sys_ui_policy_rl_action', 'business_calendar_span', 'business_calendar_filter_option', 'business_calendar_group', 'sys_choice_set' ]; return aSecondaryRecordTables; }
